authors.name: Cecilia Salazar
authors.affiliation: Laboratorio de Genómica Microbiana. Institut Pasteur de Montevideo. Uruguay and Centro de Innovación y Vigilancia Epidemiológica (CIVE).  Institut Pasteur de Montevideo. Uruguay.

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8niki","text":"Most of the defining mutations of the severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus-2 (SARS-CoV-2) variants of concern (VOCs) have been identified in the S gene sequence. For this reason, S-based lineage assignment is possible using the current nomenclature system. We have developed a protocol for overlapping amplification of the S gene sequence using previously reported primer sequences (V3 primers of ARTIC Network) in combination with a PCR barcoding approach of the samples for Nanopore sequencing plataforms. This protocol allows the screening of multiple COVID-19 positive samples for lineage/clade assignment and mutational surveillance of the spike gene. Additionally, this protocol can be is easily adapted for dual barcoding using the \"Ligation sequencing amplicons - dual barcoding (SQK-LSK109 with EXP-NBD104, EXP-NBD114, and EXP-PBC096)\" Nanopore protocol to upscale the number of samples per run.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ro0t","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ep8v","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

funders.funder_name: Fondo de Solidaridad para Proyectos Innovadores, Sociedad Civil, Francofonía y Desarrollo Humano (FSPI), Ambassade de France.

{"blocks":[{"key":"bk0vm","text":"Set up the RT-PCR reaction tubes in a clean pre-PCR cabinet by adding 2 μL of  LunaScript® RT SuperMix to each PCR tube. Include a RT-PCR negative control by replacing RNA sample with nuclease free water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5t2ju","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7anqr","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"13c40","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fcokd","text":"Add positive and negative controls if available for results validation.","type":"align-justify"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

Spin down and rest the tubes in a magnetic rack for PCR tubes for 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dnmo9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ma3","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cj7fn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"633fb","text":"Make sure AMPure XP beads reached room temperature before use.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4r18g","text":"Prepare 1 µg of clean barcoded pool in 48 µL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7bhib","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7m2tu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3lmnl","text":"Take the barcoded pool the repair and end-prep step or store the DNA at 4 ºC overnight or -20 ºC for long term storage.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"mhnu","text":"Incubate the End-prep mix in the thermal cycler as follows:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a8p2m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4kro3","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8vrgq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0":{"0":"B"},"1":{"0":"_"},"2":{"0":"2"},"A_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"C_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"}},"colTitles":["Step","Temperature (ºC)","Time"],"colWidths":["144",100,100],"data":[["Enzymes incubation","20","5 min"],["Enzymes inactivation","65","5 min"],["Hold","4","--"]],"guid":"6575C94036D711EDA399FB01D8A1B950","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"81nf9","text":"Table 7: End prep and DNA repair thermal incubation","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Enzymes incubation","20","5 min"],["Enzymes inactivation","65","5 min"],["Hold","4","--"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fdc2j","text":"(Optional) Add 1X volume of AMPure XP beads to the reaction and incubate in the rotator mixer for 5 minutes. Spin down and rest the tubes in the magnetic rack for 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c2de7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"643fo","text":"Discard the supernatant by aspiration, taking care not to disturb the pellet beads.   ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dlrbq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d8la9","text":"Wash the pellet with Ethanol 70% twice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a45be","text":"Let the pellet air dry for ~30 seconds and add 61 µLof nuclease free water and incubate at room temperature for 2 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7c251","text":"Spin down and rest the tubes in the magnetic rack for 5 minutes and recover the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c09aa","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cal11","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"dep97","text":"Take forward the end-prepped DNA into the adapter ligation step or store the sample at 4 ºC overnight","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"15ie7","text":"Incubate the reaction for 10 minutes at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5en41","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"69tgb","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"vah5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"e8911","text":"Do not incubate the reaction for longer than 10 minutes if the AMPure XP beads purification was omitted.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"97s8u","text":"Spin down the tubes and add AMPure XP beads 0.4X volume. Incubate in the rotator mixer for 5 minutes at room temperature. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6kp8g","text":"Spin down the tubes and rest the tubes in the magnet rack for 5 minutes. Pipette off the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1r155","text":"Add 200 µL of Short Fragment Buffer (SFB) and mix gently. Spin down and place the tube in the magnet rack for 5 minutes. Discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fi0ht","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ar72j","text":"Repeat the previous step.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8sslb","text":"Spin down the tube and place it in the magnet rack. Remove any residual SFB and let it air dry for ~30 seconds.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1afol","text":"Remove the tubes from the magnet and add 15 µL of Elution Buffer (EB). Flick the tube, spin down briefly and incubate the tube for 10 minutes at 37 ºC.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8e9ul","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"evb3k","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"u8cq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8k3hg","text":"The final library can be stored for up to 3 days at 4 ºC.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1n2q7","text":"Quantify the final library using a fluorometric assay.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

Additionally, a refuel after 12 hours of the sequencing run is recommended.","type":"align-justify"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":220,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"8qdgp","text":"Note that the amount of DNA library is significantly higher than the amount recommended by Oxford Nanopore (20-50 fmol).
